displayBio.en: Ai Weiwei (born 1957, Beijing) graduated from Parsons School of Design at The New School in New York in 1993. He is an artist and social activist whose work encompasses sculpture, installation, photography, film, architecture, curation, and social criticism. Ai lives and works in Beijing.
displayBio.zh-hant: 艾未未 (1957年生於北京，現工作及生活於北京)，1993年畢業於紐約帕森設計學院。他是一位藝術家及社會運動分子，作品涵蓋雕塑、裝置、攝影、電影、建築、策展和社會評論。
